entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

title: '[object Object]': null

åŒæ ·çš„è¿˜æœ‰date: '[object Object]': nullï¼Œæ’æŸ¥åŸå› æ˜¯åœ¨ç”¨ VS code çš„ prettier æ’ä»¶æ ¼å¼åŒ– md æ–‡ä»¶æ—¶ï¼ˆä¿å­˜æ–‡ä»¶æ—¶è‡ªåŠ¨æ ¼å¼åŒ–ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸æ˜“å¯Ÿè§‰ï¼‰ï¼Œä¼šå°† md å¤´æ–‡ä»¶ front-matter ä¸­çš„ `{{ }}` æ ¼å¼åŒ–ä¸º { { } }ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´å˜é‡æ— æ³•è‡ªåŠ¨å¡«å……ã€‚ ä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œæˆ‘çš„ scaffolds/post.mdï¼ˆç”¨äº hexo ç”Ÿæˆæ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰çš„ front-matter æ˜¯ï¼š

å½“æˆ‘ä¿®æ”¹äº† post.md åä¿å­˜æ–‡ä»¶æ—¶ï¼Œprettier è‡ªåŠ¨æ ¼å¼åŒ–ï¼Œå¤´æ–‡ä»¶å˜æˆäº†ï¼š

\[e^2\]

\[ \begin{equation} \label{eq1} e = m c ^ 2 \end{equation} \]

The famous matter-energy equation \(\eqref{eq1}\) proposed by Einstein...

\[ \begin{equation} \label{eq2} \begin{aligned} a &= b + c\\ &= d + e + f \\ &= h + i \end{aligned} \end{equation} \]

Equation \(\eqref{eq2}\) is a multi-line equation.
